message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You were too generous, I'll take a bit more this time!
I'll give you a bit more, but not that much! You can't have it all!
You're getting greedy, I'll give you a slightly better deal this time!
I'll give you a bit more, but not that much! You're still getting a good deal!
You're not budging, I'll meet you halfway this time!
